COMMENT_TX: ej,sadlc001,P,crawj901,Intentional HBP ej,wedge001,M,crawj901,Intentional HBP Indians pitcher Carl Sadler and Manager Eric Wedge ejected by HP umpire Jerry Crawford
ej,daalo001,P,onorb901,Intentional HBP Orioles Omar Daal ejected by HP umpire Brian O'Nora
Indians Milton Bradley left the game due to an injured leg
Orioles David Segui left the game due to an injured leg.
30 minute delay during game
ej,manuj101,M,wegnm901,Balls and strikes White Sox Manager Jerry Manuel ejected by HP umpire Mark Wegner
ej,kimmb101,C,wegnm901,Balls and strikes White Sox Coach Bruce Kimm ejected by HP umpire Mark Wegner
Debut game for Jhonny Peralta
Dodgers Fred McGriff left the game due to an injured groin
$the Dodgers were unhappy with the call at 3B

ej,pereo001,P,rapue901,Call at 3B ej,colbj101,C,rapue901,Call at 3B Dodgers pitcher Odalis Perez yelled at 3B umpire Gerry Davis after making the play for the third out; manager Jim Tracy restrained Petez, who was ejected, along with Coach Jim Colborn, by 2B umpire Ed Rapuano

Indians Jason Boyd left the game with stomach cramps; manager Eric Wedge called for Dan Miceli but Jake Westbrook came in; Wedge talked with the umpires, who allowed Micelli to pitch; Westbrook went back to the bullpen
Indians John McDonald left the game due to an injured back
Reds Jason LaRue left the game due to an injured neck/shoulder
57 minute delay during game
ej,wedge001,M,dimum901,Balls and strikes Indians Manager Eric Wedge ejected by HP umpire Mike DiMuro
Debut game for Rafael Betancourt
Debut game for Alex Prieto
Debut game for Kevin Gregg
Walk actually happened with 3 balls. 4th ball left in pitch string
Twins Corey Koskie left the game due to an injured leg

ej,laket001,P,nelss901,Call at HP $Indians catcher Tim Laker blocked the plate and thought Torii Hunter missed the plate on his head first slide; Laker ran after Hunter and tagged him; when HP umpire Scott Nelson called Hunter safe, Laker exploded and was ejected by Nelson; Laker was led off the field but threw his mask, glove and the ball and then the bat boy's stool onto the field for arguing the call at HP

Sanchez went back to 2nd just as ball arrived. He was tagged nearly simultaneously with the ball being caught by the 2nd baseman on the base.  The umpire pointed to Sanchez and called him safe, but he thought the umpire called him out and left the field.  Umpires conferred and ruled Sanchez out for leaving base.  The run from third (Santiago) was disallowed because he had slowed up and did not cross the plate before Sanchez vacated the base.  Originally called DP, not GDP, but GDP added later
Shane Loux left the game due to an injured neck/shoulder
98 is correct scoring.  Right fielder lost ball in sun, it bounced off his head to center fielder
ej,bellb001,C,bellw901,Bench jockeying Indians bench coach Buddy Bell ejected by 2B umpire Wally Bell for bench jockeying
